channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 9 best river cruises in Europe
item.description: If you're looking for a slow and easy mode of travel in Europe, try a river cruise. The choices are broader than you might expect; check out our favor...

item.title: The Edit by Chase Travel: How you can get elitelike perks without status
item.description: The Edit by Chase Travel offers select Chase cardholders valuable on-property perks like free breakfast and room upgrades at participating hotels.

item.title: Who is eligible for the American Express Business Platinum Card?
item.description: With a huge welcome bonus and a long list of perks, the American Express Business Platinum card is enticing, but exactly who is eligible?

item.title: Who's eligible for the Atmos Rewards Summit Visa Infinite Credit Card?
item.description: If you're looking to apply for the Atmos Rewards Summit Visa Infinite Credit Card, consider these eligibility requirements before applying.

item.title: U.S. Bank Business Altitude Connect Visa Signature Card review: Rewards for multiple business spending categories
item.description: Small-business owners may want to consider applying for the U.S. Bank Business Altitude Connect Visa Signature Card to earn rewards on business travel...
